attributes.action: Impeach Dr Rowan Williams from the position of Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the current Archbishop of Canterbury impeached for compromising the canon laws of the Church of England and his oath to both the Queen and the ministry of the Christian Church by supporting the recognition of Islamic Law alongside that of the State and Christian Church.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
